DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
This card gains a bonus from your Level. You can raise your Level in Events and Restsites.
Play this card after the card this combos with for an improved effect.
This card is part of your current class and will get removed as soon as you change it.
